name: Kristopher Ouwinga, Changing Seasons, Theme Space, Theme, Racing, Colour Detection
name_original: Kristopher Ouwinga, Changing Seasons, Theme Space, Theme, Racing, Colour Detection
description: included in this zip are the four main prototypes that i created for experimental game design. the first game is about the changing of seasons, the second is about the manipulation of gravity, the third is about revenge racing , and the fourth is about tangible media.
